gist.headline: Polly grabs the keyboard
gist.blurb: Our favorite bee can now fix bugs herself. Tag an issue, and she'll write the code and open a PR automatically.
gist.summary: Implemented an automated workflow where issues labeled 'polly' trigger an AI agent to generate fixes and submit pull requests.
gist.impact: Streamlines maintenance by allowing the AI to autonomously handle simple bugs, documentation updates, and minor refactors.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee taking on the role of a developer. She should be at a workstation, actively coding, representing the new ability to fix issues autonomously. The monitor robot represents the issue tracking system.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing thick coder glasses, typing on a glowing lime green (#ecf874) retro terminal. Code blocks float in the air like magic. A small monitor robot watches in awe holding a ticket. Soft pastel background, warm lighting, 8-bit aesthetic.
